ru.myx.ae3.vfs

Interface Entry

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EntryChange
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EntryARS<O,R>, EntryBinary, EntryCharacter, EntryContainer, EntryMount, EntryPrimitive
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EntryVfsRoot

    @ReflectionManual
public interface Entry
extends EntryChange
    Author:
    myx

      Indicates whether this Entry is exist and has binary content.
      default boolean isCharacter()
      Indicates whether this Entry is exist and has text content.
      default boolean isContainer()
      Indicates whether this Entry is exist and is a collection.
      default boolean isExist()
      Indicates whether this Entry exists on persistent storage.
      default boolean isFile()
      Indicates whether this Entry is exist and is a file (primitive or binary), not a collection.

      Indicates whether this Entry is hidden.
      default boolean isMount()
      Indicates whether this Entry is a mount.
      default boolean isPrimitive()
      Indicates whether this Entry is exist and has primitive content.
      default Entry relative(Entry share, String path, TreeLinkType mode)
      - empty path returns not 'this' but 'null'; - paths starting with '/' return 'null' if share is null

        @ReflectionExplicit
Value<Boolean> doMoveRename(Entry newEntry)
        moves/renames given entry.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        succeeds only if both entries are located in the same storage.

      • doRename

        @ReflectionExplicit
Value<Boolean> doRename(String newKey)
        renames given entry. Equivalent to: 
         entry.getParent().toContainer().setContentRename(entry.getKey(), newKey)
        Parameters:
        newKey -
        Returns:

      • doUnlink

        @ReflectionExplicit
Value<Boolean> doUnlink()
        Unlinks given entry. Equivalent to: 
         entry.getParent().toContainer().setContentUndefined(entry.getKey())
        Returns:

      • getBinaryContent

        @ReflectionExplicit
default Value<? extends TransferCopier> getBinaryContent()
                                                                      throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Tries to return binary content for any possible type of entry. If entry is character - the UTF-8 character set is used.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException

      • getKey

        @ReflectionExplicit
String getKey()
        Returns entry key. Returns NULL when this entry is a root entry.
        Returns:
        key

      • getLastModified

        @ReflectionExplicit
long getLastModified()
        Returns 'last-modified' date of given link.
        Returns:

      • getLocation

        @ReflectionExplicit
String getLocation()
        Returns location path in hierarchy. '' for root entry and so on separated by '/'.
        Returns:
        location

      • getMode

        @ReflectionExplicit
TreeLinkType getMode()
        Returns:

      • getParent

        @ReflectionExplicit
Entry getParent()
        Returns parent entry of this entry. Returns NULL when this entry is a root entry.
        Returns:
        parent entry

      • getTextContent

        @ReflectionExplicit
default Value<? extends CharSequence> getTextContent()
                                                                  throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Tries to return text content for any possible type of entry. If entry is binary - the UTF-8 character set is used.
        Returns:
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException

      • getValue

        @ReflectionExplicit
Object getValue()
        Returns the 'value' of the entry. For primitive entries (isPrimitive() returns true) the value is it's primitive value. For binary entries the value returned is 'isBinary' value. For entries that are not known to have meaningful 'value' (like container entries) an Exception must be thrown. TODO: make 'container' entries return BaseVfsFolderObject with recursive properties by getValue().
        Returns:

      • isBinary

        @ReflectionExplicit
default boolean isBinary()
        Indicates whether this Entry is exist and has binary content.
        Returns:

      • isCharacter

        @ReflectionExplicit
default boolean isCharacter()
        Indicates whether this Entry is exist and has text content. (not all storages support explicit text content). Which is either isPrimitive and the primitive is an instance of String or BinaryText with known charset encoding.
        Returns:

      • isContainer

        @ReflectionExplicit
default boolean isContainer()
        Indicates whether this Entry is exist and is a collection.
        Returns:

      • toBinary

        @ReflectionExplicit
default EntryBinary toBinary()
        Works when isBinary() method returns TRUE. Returns binary entry instance. NOTE: use this method, "instanceof EntryBinary" will not work well, since implementation is free to implement any interfaces on actual entry for it's own purposes and/or memory utilization optimization.
        Returns:

      • toCharacter

        @ReflectionExplicit
default EntryCharacter toCharacter()
        Works when isText() method returns TRUE. Returns a text entry instance. NOTE: use this method, "instanceof EntryText" will not work well, since implementation is free to implement any interfaces on actual entry for it's own purposes and/or memory utilization optimization. `
        Returns:

      • toContainer

        @ReflectionExplicit
default EntryContainer toContainer()
        Works when isContainer() method returns TRUE. Returns container entry instance. NOTE: use this method, "instanceof EntryContainer" will not work well, since implementation is free to implement any interfaces on actual entry for it's own purposes and/or memory utilization optimization.
        Returns:

      • toMount

        @ReflectionExplicit
default EntryMount toMount()
        Works when isMount() method returns TRUE. Returns mount entry instance. NOTE: use this method, "instanceof EntryMount" will not work well, since implementation is free to implement any interfaces on actual entry for it's own purposes and/or memory utilization optimization.
        Returns:

      • toPrimitive

        @ReflectionExplicit
default EntryPrimitive toPrimitive()
        Works when isPrimitive() method returns TRUE. Returns primitive entry instance. NOTE: use this method, "instanceof EntryPrimitive" will not work well, since implementation is free to implement any interfaces on actual entry for it's own purposes and/or memory utilization optimization. `
        Returns:
